Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Thanks for the hand, I've been trapped here for a week and let me tell you I am sick of it. You got a camp around here somewhere? A town you say? Well, that sounds like a much better sight than these walls. I'll meet you there after I pack.][SendToTown]
[Name:Slow Down][Text:How come all the rush all the time? You need to slow down and relax.][Default]
[Name:Anvil Smash][Text:Y'know, it's hard to be stressed when your job involves pounding an anvil all day. Couldn't recommend it more.][Default]
[Name:Gift][Text:Oh, thank you. I really appreciate this.]
[Name:Collection][Text:Is that really for me? $Name$! Thank you. This really means a lot to me.]
[Name:Selection][Text:Hello, what can I do for you?][Selection:VillageTalk]
[Name:JoinPartyYes][Text:Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish.]
[Name:JoinPartyNo][Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.]
[Name:Raining|1][Text:You're running around in this rain? Ha, of course you are. There's no stopping you, is there? It's admirable, if concerning.][Weather:Raining]

[Name:Task_3_Start][Text:Cheery little place here, and the drink ain't bad either! Now that you're here though, let's get down to brass tacks. I've been looking for a new place to settle down, has some... unpleasantness back home. I was going to head down to one of the big cities like Easthem, but since you help me out I think maybe I'll stay here. I'm more likely to make a mark in a small village like this anyway! What do I need I hear you ask? Simple! Nothing more than setting up a $WorldObject_35$ for me.][UnlockObjectID:35]
